other_tests.findings: The liver is fatty infiltrated with an area of sparing in the right lobe. Mild fat stranding surrounding the appendix. Colonic diverticulosis with no evidence of acute diverticulitis is seen. The appendix is mildly thickened and dilated measuring up to 8 mm with surrounding fat stranding. Mildly hyperdense material in the gallbladder may represent small gallstones. Small fat-containing umbilical hernia is seen. No lymphadenopathy.
